trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<select>" /> element on the server.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to create a selection box.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件创建选择框中选择。

trans-unit.source: Specify item listings in the control by placing HTML `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 指定控件中的项列表，通过将 HTML`<option>`元素开始标记和结束之间`<select>`标记。

trans-unit.source: Each item is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: 每个项都由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: To specify the text that is displayed for each item in the control, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the item, or simply place text between the opening and closing `<option>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定每个项在控件中显示的文本，可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性的项或直接将文本放置到开始和结束之间`<option>`标记。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the item, you can associate a value with the item that is different from the text.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的项的属性，你可以使用不同于文本的项关联的值。

trans-unit.source: To select an item from the list by default, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the item to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要从列表中选择一个项，默认情况下，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>项的属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance and behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制的外观和行为<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property specifies the height (in rows) of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性指定控件的高度 （以行为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property specifies whether more than one item can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性指定是否多个项可以同时选择中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件将显示为下拉列表框。

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许多重选择 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性`true`) 或指定大于一个行的高度 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性的值大于`1`)，该控件将显示为列表框。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to get the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定单项选择中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性来获取所选的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用此值要检索的项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定从所选的项目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>允许进行多选的控制循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合并测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的每个项的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>类提供了两个属性，以支持数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 若要将数据绑定到任何对象，它实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口 (如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>)，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>接口，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性来指定要绑定到数据源。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性，必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property and set its value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要自动绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件拖到数据源由数据源控件，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性并将其值设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>要使用的数据源控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不需要显式调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify which fields in the data source bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of an item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定数据源中的哪些字段绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>通过设置控件中的项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个数据源，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>属性来指定要绑定到该控件的特定源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象具有多个表，必须指定要绑定到与该控件的表<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control by explicitly declaring the items that appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>通过显式声明在控件中显示的项的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control by binding the control to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>通过将控件绑定到数据源的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to specify the data source for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性指定的数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control used to retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件，用于检索数据。

trans-unit.source: When the page is loaded, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control automatically binds to the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and the data is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 加载页面后，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件会自动绑定到指定的数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>向用户显示控件和数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The "select" literal string.
trans-unit.target: "Select"的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and place it on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何动态创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件并将它放置在网页上。

trans-unit.source: The parsed child control to add.
Adds a parsed child control to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method is used by ASP.NET to add parsed child controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A>方法由 ASP.NET 用来添加已分析的子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always checks that an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> class is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> selected items collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.AddParsedSubObject%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终检查的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>类添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>选择项集合。

trans-unit.source: The child control specified by the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter must be of the type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem" />.

Clears the list selection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control and sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected" /> property of all items to <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A> method iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property and sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A>方法循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>集合由<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>属性，并设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>对象传递给`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always clears all selected items of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ClearSelection%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终清除所有选定的项的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> to contain the current server control's child server controls.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control does not allow child controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件不允许子控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the set of data to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control from a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> property with multiple sets of data.
The set of data to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control from a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的数据集<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件从<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />与多个数据集。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates the property has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这指示的属性未设置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sets of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which set of data to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性包含多个数据集，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>属性来指定要绑定到该控件的数据集。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> object with multiple tables, use this property to indicate which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象具有多个表，请使用此属性指示要绑定到该控件的表。

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source to bind to the control, you can then specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 指定要绑定到该控件的数据源后，你可以随后指定要绑定到数据源中哪些字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>通过设置控件中每个项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>属性分别。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify a set of data to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control from a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property with multiple sets of data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>属性来指定要绑定到的数据集<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件从<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>具有多个数据集属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> property is set during the data-binding phase of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
Gets or sets the source of information to bind to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" /> that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />或<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IListSource" />，其中包含用于提供到该控件的数据的值的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性来指定要绑定到数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: A data source must be a collection that implements either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 数据源必须实现是集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口 (如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>) 或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性，必须手动编写代码以执行数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple sets of data, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> object with multiple tables, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to specify which data set to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个集的数据，如<xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象具有多个表，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>属性以指定要绑定到控件的数据集。

trans-unit.source: You can specify which fields from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties of each item in the control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定要绑定到数据源中哪些字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>通过设置控件中每个项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataValueField%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>自动将其绑定到数据源由数据源控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性，数据列表控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method.

Gets or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property of the data source control that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control should use to retrieve its data source.
The programmatic identifier assigned to the data source control.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to set or access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source.

trans-unit.source: The data source control referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property can be any control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.

trans-unit.target: 数据源控件必须存在处于相同的命名容器<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>引用它的控件或中的父控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class provides two properties for specifying the data source to bind to.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property allows you to bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource?displayProperty=nameWithType> interfaces (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性允许你将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件添加到任何集合可实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口 (如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source, you must explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind the control and its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> property to the data source.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性指定数据源，你必须明确地调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法以将控件绑定并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A>到数据源的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property allows you to bind an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to a data source control that represents a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性允许你将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>表示的数据源的数据源控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property to specify the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control and its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataTextField%2A> property automatically bind to the specified data source control.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind" /> method.
When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性，ASP.NET 会自动将数据绑定列表控件到指定的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> method first to verify that the control has not already been data-bound and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当 ASP.NET 执行数据绑定控件时，它将调用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A>方法首先验证控件尚未被数据绑定和有效的数据源控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>接口指定为其<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A> method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to ensure that the control is data-bound immediately after the call to this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.EnsureDataBound%2A>方法然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法，以确保，控件被数据绑定到此方法在调用后立即。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> object that represents the data source that is bound to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> object.
If no data source is specified, a default value of <see langword="null" /> is returned.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.GetData%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> object independent of whether the data source was specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.GetData%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>对象独立于数据源由指定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.
\- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" />.

Both a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property are defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
\- or -
The requested data view cannot be found.
Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control without automatically converting special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
This property is not supported for this control.
The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection" /> that contains the items listed in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
The collection of all incoming name values.
Processes the postback data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's state has changed as a result of a postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks whether the postback data of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>方法检查是否的回发数据<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件不同于以前的值，并且如果是这样，则返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `false`, indicating a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性是`false`，指示单项选择<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件，则<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>方法检查<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is `true`, indicating a multiple-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method checks the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性是`true`，，该值指示多选<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件，则<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>方法检查<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadPostData%2A>主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.

Restores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> method.
This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的视图状态存储为<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>字段<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象容纳<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的基本视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>字段<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象容纳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>集合由<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>字段<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象保存由所选的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to restore the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A>方法调用基类的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，使还原控件的基本视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState%2A>主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> method so that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state is properly managed.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.LoadViewState(System.Object)" />方法，以便<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />适当管理控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected concurrently in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
<see langword="true" /> if multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果可以在中同时选择多个项<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件的指针; 否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to specify whether multiple items can be concurrently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性来指定多个项是否可以同时选择中<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件将显示为下拉列表框。

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许多重选择 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性`true`) 或指定大于一个行的高度 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性的值大于`1`)，该控件将显示为列表框。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定中的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件，它允许多个同时进行的选择，循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合并测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的每个项的属性。

trans-unit.source: The `multiple` attribute is rendered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control only if this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `multiple`属性呈现在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制仅当此属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to specify whether multiple items can be selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性指定是否可以在中选择多个项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique identifier name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
The unique identifier name associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的唯一标识符名称<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property to determine the unique identifier name for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A>属性来确定的唯一标识符名称<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, the `get` accessor returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中，`get`访问器返回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，`set`访问器不会分配给此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property must have the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to work properly.
trans-unit.target: `set`因为访问器不会对此属性分配一个值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A>属性必须具有相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to select a specific item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Name%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件以选中中的特定项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>列表。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>时数据绑定到引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通知控件来执行与之关联的任何数据绑定逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection from the data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A>方法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>中任意一种指定的数据源中的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.
\- or -
The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" />.

Both a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property are defined for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
\- or -
The requested data view cannot be found.

The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.

When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性`true`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性已更改。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to change the property value during the data-binding phase of the control.
The source of the event.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Invoked when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" />, or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is changed.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A>方法通知<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件来执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A> property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>属性是`false`和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A>属性是`true`，则<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that the registered delegates received the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> method notifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A>方法通知<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制，它应与之关联的页面中执行普遍适用于每个 HTTP 请求的操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A> method connects the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to the appropriate data source specified in either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnLoad%2A>方法连接<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件添加到适当的数据源中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A> property is to specify the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control should use to retrieve its data source, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A> method is set as the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>属性是指定的数据源控件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件应该使用来检索其数据源，则<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataSourceViewChanged%2A>方法设置为事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The ID specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property cannot be found.
\- or -
The control specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property is not of the type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IDataSource" />.

The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID" /> property.
\- or -
The requested <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember" /> property could not be found.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.

If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property is greater than 1, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> method registers the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> control as one that requires postback processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性大于 1，则<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A>方法寄存器<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>控件作为一种要求回发的处理。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A> method so that it allows multiple selections in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnPreRender%2A>方法，以便它在自定义允许进行多选<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>引发事件时在所选的项目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制发往服务器之间的更改。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a Submit button.
trans-unit.target: 仅当用户启动的发送到服务器，例如单击提交按钮时，引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event does not cause a post to the server to occur.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不会导致向服务器进行的发送。

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 控件必须具有启用视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform data validation on the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control when the user changes the selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件以对执行数据验证<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制当用户更改控件中的选定内容。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序确定所选的项目是否互相兼容。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnServerChange(System.EventArgs)" /> method to signal the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control that the state of the control has changed.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's attributes to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method renders the `name` attribute of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control directly to ensure that it has the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>方法呈现`name`属性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件直接以确保它具有相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: After rendering the attribute, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 呈现该特性之后,<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>方法调用基类的<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderAttributes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A> method in a custom server control so that specific title text is always displayed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderAttributes%2A>方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便始终显示特定标题文本<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's child controls to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> method overrides the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method without calling the base method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A>方法重写基类的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>而不会调用基方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: Each of the `<option>` elements between the opening and closing `<select>` tags is rendered with a `value` attribute, a `selected` attribute if the item is selected, and its associated text.
trans-unit.target: 每个`<option>`元素开始标记和结束之间`<select>`标记呈现与`value`属性，`selected`特性如果选定了项和其关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: If multiple items were selected but the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `false`, then an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择多个项目，但<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性设置为`false`，则<xref:System.Web.HttpException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A> method so that it always displays default option text in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RenderChildren%2A>方法，以便它始终显示在自定义的默认选项文本<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Multiple items were selected but the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control needs to bind to its specified data source.
<see langword="true" /> if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果该控件需要绑定到数据源;，否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性以确定控件是否需要调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>方法将绑定到其指定的数据源。

trans-unit.source: Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 每次`set`上调用访问器<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSource%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataSourceID%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.DataMember%2A>属性更改后的数据源<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnInit%2A>方法已调用时，ASP.NET 会自动设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性也设置为`true`时<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 自动设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.RequiresDataBinding%2A>属性`false`后立即<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Saves any <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control view state changes that have occurred since the page was posted back to the server.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> view state.
If no view state is associated with the object, this method returns a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's view state is stored as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的视图状态存储为<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.First>字段<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象容纳<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件的基本视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection> collection represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Second>字段<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象容纳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection>集合由<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third> field of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet> object holds the selected indices represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet.Third>字段<xref:System.Web.UI.Triplet>对象保存由所选的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to save the control's base view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A>方法调用基类的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以将控件的基本视图状态保存。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState%2A>主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" /> method so that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's view state is properly managed.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SaveViewState" />方法，以便<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />适当管理控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the items to select.
Selects multiple items of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control's <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items" /> collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Select%2A> method selects multiple items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Select%2A>方法选择多个项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordinal index of the selected item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
The ordinal index of the selected item in an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的选定项的序号索引<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件。

trans-unit.source: A value of <see langword="-1" /> indicates that no item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 值为<see langword="-1" />指示未选定任何项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is commonly used to determine the index of the selected item in a single-selection <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性通常用于确定单项选择中的选定项的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: This index can then be used to retrieve the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用此索引检索的项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property is set to `true`, indicating that multiple items can be concurrently selected, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property contains the index of the first selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性设置为`true`，，该值指示，可以同时选择多个项，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性包含的第一个选定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control that allows multiple simultaneous selections, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of each item.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定从所选的项目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件，它允许多个同时进行的选择，循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合并测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的每个项的属性。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have no item selected.
trans-unit.target: 很可能没有选择的项。

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property contains a value of `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不选定任何项，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性包含的值的`-1`。

trans-unit.source: This commonly occurs when the page first loads and an item is not selected by default.
trans-unit.target: 这通常发生在首次加载页面和默认情况下不选择项。

trans-unit.source: Provide code to test this value before referencing the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供的代码来引用中的项之前，测试此值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown if the index is out of the range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果索引超出了集合的范围，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件将显示为下拉列表框。

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许多重选择 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性`true`) 或指定大于一个行的高度 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性的值大于`1`)，该控件将显示为列表框。

trans-unit.source: If a drop-down list box is displayed, an item is always selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示一个下拉列表框，则始终选择项。

trans-unit.source: If a list box is displayed, you can programmatically clear the selection from all items by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示一个列表框，则可以通过设置以编程方式清除所有项从所选内容<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性`-1`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性来确定中的选定项的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The index is then used to retrieve the selected item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后使用索引检索的选定的项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The property was set to a value greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
Gets a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
A collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当前包含的所有索引从零开始的集合中选择的项<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class to return a collection that contains the zero-based indexes of all currently selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>属性由<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>类以返回当前包含的所有索引从零开始的集合中选择的项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A> property to provide a custom algorithm for returning currently selected items.
trans-unit.target: 控件扩展的功能的开发人员<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>类可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndices%2A>属性，以提供自定义算法，用于返回当前选择项。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control change between posts to the server.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event is raised when the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control change between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>引发事件时在所选的项目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控制发往服务器之间的更改。

trans-unit.source: The control must have view state enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 控件必须具有启用视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler declaratively for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式为<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序确定所选的项目是否互相兼容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler programmatically for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式为<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.ServerChange>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler determines whether the selected items are compatible with each other.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序确定所选的项目是否互相兼容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height (in rows) of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
The height (in rows) of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （以行为单位）<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性指定的高度 （以行为单位）<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a size that is smaller than the number of items in the control, scroll bars are displayed to allow you to move up and down the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定大小小于控件中的项的数目时，将显示滚动条，以允许你在列表中上下移动。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control is displayed as a drop-down list box.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件将显示为下拉列表框。

trans-unit.source: If you allow multiple selections (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A> property to `true`) or specify a height greater than one row (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to a value greater than `1`), the control is displayed as a list box.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许多重选择 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Multiple%2A>属性`true`) 或指定大于一个行的高度 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性的值大于`1`)，该控件将显示为列表框。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A> property to specify the height (in rows) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Size%2A>属性指定的高度 （以行为单位）<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control so the changes can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.TrackViewState%2A> method persists items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control to view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.TrackViewState%2A>方法中的项保存<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Items%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件以查看状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or sets the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex" /> property of the control to the index of the first item in the list with the specified value.
The value of the selected item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 中的选定项的值<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" />控件。

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控件中，未不选定任何项<see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />返回。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> property is commonly used to get the value of the item referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A>属性通常用于获取所引用的项的值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If no item is selected in the control, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控件中，未不选定任何项<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>返回。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to a value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is updated with the index of the first item in the list that contains that value.
trans-unit.target: 如果将此属性设置为一个值，<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性更新列表中包含该值的第一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: If no matching value is found, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A> property is left unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何匹配的值，则<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.SelectedIndex%2A>属性将保留不变。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A> property to get the value of the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value%2A>属性来获取的值中的选定项<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect.Value" /> property was set to an item greater than the number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect" /> control or less than <see langword="-1" />.
